##Progress Report

```{r}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
library(Lahman)

head(HallOfFame, 3)
```

Required information in Hall Of Fame dataset:
- playerID
- yearID
- votedBy
- ballots (Total Number Cast)
- needed (Total Number to be Inducted)
- votes (Total Number of Votes received)
- inducted (Y, N)
- category
- needed_note
